title: Join The Crew: Our Email Signup
seoTitle: Join The Crew: Our Email Signup
body:
# **Get our BEST updates delivered to your inbox.**

Every Wednesday at 10pm EST in the US, we send our weekly newsletter.

You'll get our weekly golf predictions plus latest YouTube content. 

We know your attention is limited and your inbox is full of noise. But you'll be opening ours every week. If there wasn't value, we wouldn't send it.

Thanks so much,\
\
JMac\
Bet Refinery
description: Join the Bet Refinery newsletter. We send out the best updates every week. On Wednesday at 10pm EST (USA).
